S

SavedMedicine - Class in com.example.medirem_project
SavedMedicine is the singleton class that holds all the saved medicine information
saveMedicine(String, String, String, String) - Method in class com.example.medirem_project.SavedMedicine
Method for saving medicine to the list
SaveMedicineSharedPreferences() - Method in class com.example.medirem_project.MainActivity
This method creates a list to hold all the information about the saved medicine of the singleton list and then saves the newly created list to a string that uses the gson library.
saveTime(String) - Method in class com.example.medirem_project.Medicine
Method for saving the time that the user took the medicine
setAdapter(ArrayList<Medicine>) - Method in class com.example.medirem_project.MainActivity
This method sets the adapter so that the list will update.
setMedicine(ArrayList<Medicine>) - Method in class com.example.medirem_project.SavedMedicine
Method for setting a new list to the Singleton list
SetOpeningView() - Method in class com.example.medirem_project.MainActivity
